name: Edward PUNDT, Individually and as Representative of Plan Participants and Plan Beneficiaries of Verizon Management Pension Plan, petitioner, v. VERIZON COMMUNICATIONS, INC., et al.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Edward PUNDT, Individually and as Representative of Plan Participants and Plan Beneficiaries of Verizon Management Pension Plan, petitioner,
v.
VERIZON COMMUNICATIONS, INC., et al.
attorneys: On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit for further consideration in light of Spokeo, Inc. v. Robins, 578 U.S. ----, 136 S.Ct. 1540, 194 L.Ed.2d 635 (2016).
casebody.head_matter:
Edward PUNDT, Individually and as Representative of Plan Participants and Plan Beneficiaries of Verizon Management Pension Plan, petitioner,
v.
VERIZON COMMUNICATIONS, INC., et al.
No. 15-785.
Supreme Court of the United States
May 23, 2016.
On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit for further consideration in light of Spokeo, Inc. v. Robins, 578 U.S. ----, 136 S.Ct. 1540, 194 L.Ed.2d 635 (2016).
